SENT.plain: Liraglutide is a GLP-1 receptor agonist, a novel medication for type 2 diabetes
We describe a case of pustules in a patient recently started on liraglutide
Common side effects of liraglutide are gastrointestinal disorders
Skin and tissue reactions are less well-known side effects
Liraglutide could be the cause of skin eruptions in this patient, possibly by immunogenicity
